changes_made: Added new Section 9 'Security Considerations' with 5 subsections covering all Stage 4 findings

Section 9.1 'ReDoS Resistance': Documented ReDoS safety of proposed patterns (defaultOptionPattern, normalOptionPattern) and low-risk assessment of TEXT_INPUT_PATTERNS /enter\s+/i (S4-001). Added CLAUDE_THINKING_PATTERN evaluation frequency note (S4-008)
Section 9.2 'Command Injection Defense': Documented defense-in-depth recommendation for asserting resolveAutoAnswer() output format before sendKeys() as future improvement (S4-003)
Section 9.3 'Auto-Yes Auto-Approval Risk': Documented known risk of auto-approving destructive operations via unconditional 'y' response, listed future follow-up candidates (S4-006)
Section 9.4 'Residual False Positive Risk': Documented remaining False Positive risk from stale prompt marker in 50-line window, cross-referenced Section 5.4 test #3 (S4-002)

Section 9.5 'ANSI Processing, Logging, OWASP Confirmation': Confirmed stripAnsi() adequacy (S4-004), confirmed logging does not expose sensitive data (S4-005), confirmed no OWASP Top 10 violations (S4-007)
Renumbered former Section 10 (Quality Checks) to Section 10 (unchanged number), former Section 10 (Review Summary) to Section 11, former Section 11 (Implementation Checklist) to Section 12
Added Section 11.4 'Stage 4: Security Review' with findings summary table for all 8 items (S4-001 through S4-008)
Added 5 S4-related items to Section 11.5 'Technical Debt' table (S4-001, S4-002, S4-003, S4-006, S4-008)
Added new 'Security Response (Stage 4)' subsection in Section 12 Implementation Checklist with 5 checklist items (S4-001, S4-002, S4-003, S4-006, S4-008)
